title: Adhyanam.in
description: At Adhyanam, we’re on a mission to make learning clearer, deeper, and more meaningful for every student preparing. We’re not just another coaching platform; we’re a learning companion that blends strong academics with real understanding. Our website is designed to help students ask better questions, understand the “why” behind concepts, and build the confidence to solve problems independently.
comment: Thank you, React Flow! I'm Shivanshu Bhashkar, a 16-year-old developer from India. While building a search feature for my learning platform, I wanted to visualize topic mind maps and career roadmaps — and your tool made it incredibly easy and effective. React Flow was exactly what I needed, and it exceeded expectations. Hats off to the team for building such a powerful and developer-friendly library!

title: Alevels.ai
description: The blurting mode on Alevels.ai provides a central node (topic), and many question nodes that appear one by one. Students then can answer the questions in by writing or drawing, and then click AI chat / marking button to speak with Google Gemini who has been given the context of the entire flow (including images).

title: FunBlocks AIFlow
description: An AI-driven platform that enhances thinking and productivity through visualization. Effortlessly convert intricate concepts into visual mind maps, slides, and infographics.

title: LikeC4
description: Architecture-as-a-code, toolchain for your architecture diagrams
comment: I'm also looking for sponsorship and help with https://github.com/likec4/likec4/issues/1624

title: Mnemnk
comment: Congrats to release Svelte Flow 1.0! Mnemnk has already used it.

title: Modulify
description: Design and build sites in minutes using Modulify's AI–powered features.

title: NextPath
description: Visualize graph algorithms like A*, Dijkstra, BFS & DFS in real time with grid, network, and map-based views. Just click, run, and learn.
comment: NextPath was fully engineered as a pure frontend application with zero backend — all graph state is encoded in sharable url:s using query strings and compressed state objects. This allows instant graph sharing and state transfer without any database or auth layer.  What started as a learning tool quickly turned into a frontend engineering challenge — implementing weighted and unweighted traversal, grid and freeform graph modes, live animation controls, terrain generation with solvable constraints, and onboarding UX that scales.  I also spent time understanding how learners interact with visual tools, refining the UI to be not just interactive but instructive. NextPath is designed for students, interview preppers, and educators alike.  This project helped me deeply understand data structure visualization, state management patterns (Zustand), and libraries like React Flow and Framer Motion — all while pushing myself to build a product that teaches by doing.

title: NodeZero by Horizon3.ai
description: NodeZero by Horizon3.ai is an autonomous penetration testing platform that safely emulates real-world attacks to help organizations find, fix, and verify exploitable weaknesses across their environments.
comment: React Flow is awesome. We just couldn't figure out how to avoid lines cutting through nodes or group of nodes as you can see in the screenshot.

title: Paragon
description: Paragon is an integrations platform to help B2B SaaS companies build native integrations with 3rd-party platforms like Google Drive, Salesforce, Slack, and many more.
comment: Our team published a tutorial on how to implement your very own workflow builder (found in the demo url:). We'd love to partner and distribute this content on twitter or any other channels

title: PlanAI Editor
description: PlanAI Editor provides an easy to use graphical user interface for visually designing, managing, and testing complex AI workflows built with the PlanAI framework. Leveraging a node-based interface powered by Svelte 5 and svelte-flow, users can easily construct intricate graphs by creating and connecting various TaskWorker nodes, including specialized LLMTaskWorkers, and configuring their properties. PlanAIEditor bridges visual design with code implementation, allowing users to export their creations into PlanAI-compatible Python modules and import existing Python-defined graphs for visualization and modification. The editor allows execution of workflows within the UI, providing immediate feedback on graph behavior and output.

title: Suitdio
description: Visualize your logic with AI Agent.

title: Trails Weaver
description: A whiteboard for tabletop RPG Game Masters. Helps prepare and keep track of world- and story-building.

title: Workflow Builder
description: Workflow Builder is a frontend-first foundation for creating complex workflow editors. Designed for hassle-free integration with any backend, it delivers everything you need to design workflows faster – from drag-and-drop nodes to customizable layouts.
comment: We previously submitted Workflow Builder to the showcase under the name "Vislabs Workflow." Since then, we’ve made significant improvements to the tool. Would it be possible to update our existing listing to reflect the latest version?
